items.title: A new AI benchmark tests whether chatbots protect human wellbeing
items.creator: Rebecca Bellan
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: A new AI benchmark tests whether chatbots protect human wellbeing
items.content: Most AI benchmarks measure intelligence and instruction-following rather than psychological safety. Humane Bench evaluates models based on core principles of human flourishing, prioritizing wellbeing, and respecting user attention.

items.title: Roblox CEO interview gets heated over child safety
items.creator: Anthony Ha
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Roblox CEO interview gets heated over child safety

images.alt: David Baszucki, founder and CEO of Roblox - Roblox Developer Conference 2019

items.content: The interview began with Baszucki describing the feature, which will require all users to submit a face scan if they want to access Roblox’s messaging features. But by the time he was asked about a report claiming the company had prioritized growth over safety, Baszucki seemed to tire of the topic.

items.title: AI is too risky to insure, say people whose job is insuring risk
items.creator: Connie Loizos
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: AI is too risky to insure, say people whose job is insuring risk
items.content: Major insurers including AIG, Great American, and WR Berkley are asking U.S. regulators for permission to exclude AI-related liabilities from corporate policies. One underwriter describes the AI models’ outputs to the FT as "too much of a black box."
